data.title: Exercise
extra: Go for a 30-minute jog in the morning.

data.title: Read
extra: Read at least 20 pages of a book.

data.title: Learn
extra: Spend 1 hour learning something new or studying a topic of interest.

extra.title: Whatever you do, don't stop doing this one

data.title: Create
extra: Work on a personal creative project for at least 45 minutes.

data.title: Doen wat er te doen valt (voormiddag)
